DOC.brief_summary: In study investigator would like describe FDG-PET/CT response patient receive CART-19 immunotherapy Follicular Lymphoma ( FL ) , Diffuse Large B-cell Lymphoma ( DLBCL ) , Mantle Cell Lymphoma ( MCL ) part UPCC # 13413 . Subjects undergo two FDG-PET/CTs . One perform within 6 week CART-19 infusion repeat scan 1 month infusion .
